short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of nature with Capturing Windy Memories Live Wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension features a peaceful scene where the wind gently moves through the landscape, evoking a sense of calm and nostalgia. Easily access your favorite websites, add custom links, and stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy a tranquil scene with wind gently blowing through nature.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly access your favorite websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with custom links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on schedule with an integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Conduct web searches easily with your preferred engine.
Explore more nature-themed extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
